new: Report redesign: New section order (Streak → Activity Chart → Level → Recent Activity) with a more visual, easy-to-scan layout
Streak (Commitment Meter): See which days you showed up (✓/✗), total focus in Last 7 days, and your current and best streak
Recent Activity: Card layout for completed tasks (up to 5) with a "View Done History" button that opens Tasks on the Done tab
Free users: Single overlay over Activity, Level, and Recent Activity with "Unlock analytics to see if you're improving every day" and one Unlock Unlimited button
improved: Activity Chart: Removed Daily filter; only Weekly, Monthly, Yearly. White bars with hours above each bar. Clearer labels (Last 7 days, Last 4 weeks, month names)
Level: White progress bar (slimmer), student-focused level names with emojis (e.g. JUST STARTING, EXAM READY, LEGENDARY STUDENT), total hours in section, centered "View All Levels" modal
Streak: A day counts as active only if you focused at least ~36 seconds (no checkmark for 0.00h)
Report styling: Consistent border-radius on range buttons, right-aligned "Xh to NEXT LEVEL" text

new: Premium Plans: Choose between Monthly ($3.99) or Lifetime ($12) access with flexible payment options
Smart Tier System: Personalized experience with different limits for Guest (1), Free (2), and Premium users
Enhanced Analytics: Separate Activity Chart and Summary Stats for better insights into your focus patterns
improved: Pricing modal messaging: Clearer, more concise call-to-action messaging with reduced redundancy
Visual refinements: Better spacing, typography, and dark scrollbar design throughout pricing sections
Form management: Smarter form reset logic that automatically shows creation forms when under limits
Task management UX: Improved feedback when deleting tasks with proper state management
fixed: Fixed form not clearing properly after deleting last task
Fixed task input not resetting to show placeholder after deletion
Improved conditional flow for Guest vs Free user limit modals
Better form display logic to prevent unnecessary modal overlays

new: Automatic Data Backup: Your focus stats, custom timers, and vibes now auto-sync to the cloud every 5 sessions
Data Recovery: Lost data can now be recovered from server backups when you log in
Admin Diagnostics: New monitoring system to detect and prevent data loss issues
improved: Report now shows your total hours when monthly breakdown is unavailable
Custom timers and vibes stay visible (but disabled) when logged out, just like Tasks
Better visual feedback with '(Sign up required)' labels on disabled features
fixed: CRITICAL: Fixed data loss issue affecting users who logged out between Jan 6-22. Users lost their focus stats, custom timers, vibes, and streaks due to a security fix that cleared localStorage without server backup. New auto-sync system prevents this from happening again.
Report now correctly displays all-time stats when daily data is missing
Custom timers and vibes now reload properly after logout

new: Share on X: Share your completed focus cycles on X (Twitter) with one click
Release Notes: Stay updated with new features and improvements right from the app
improved: Cleaner and more minimal daily limit notification
Better timer controls and settings interface
Smoother animations and transitions throughout the app
fixed: Improved reliability when switching between devices
Better performance on slower internet connections
Fixed occasional issues with timer starting

new: Custom Vibes: Create your own focus environments with custom music and backgrounds
Leaderboard: See your ranking and compete with other focused users
improved: Faster app loading times across all pages
Enhanced Spotify integration with more playlist recommendations
fixed: Timer now starts reliably on first click
Stats display correctly even with slow connections
